Posted By: Danny Grimes
I am interested in trading these 3 cards or any combo, for a t206 Hal Chase Hindu back. The SGC 60's are in nice shape with good color, and the southern leaguer is a clean typical VG card with an irregular top cut which passed to a VG holder. 

Also looking for a Chase w/Old mill back, i wont trade the Hindu for it but if theres any interest in the other two give me a shout, thx!

SGC 60 Stanage SC 350
SGC 60 Murphy w/bat Pied.350
SGC 40 Mullaney SL Hindu
